ns1:Asset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - CM2012 - Install Site System
ns1:Asset.ns1:body:
If ($CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME not defined. Please set variable before running!'; EXIT 1}
# Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 # Copy Common scripts to local profile Get-AppFiles "Common"
. .\Logging.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
#Use ArgList variable in Start-Process commands so embedded variables and env variables resolve
$DomainFQDN = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainFQDN")).value $DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value $ServiceAccountName = "$DomainNetBIOS\$env:CM_ServiceAccount" $ServiceAccountPwd = get-serviceAccountPassword -username $env:CM_ServiceAccount.ToLower() # Covert to lowercase as get-serviceAccountPassword function is case sensitive $PShEXE = "$PSHome\Powershell.exe"
If ($DomainFQDN -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainFQDN cannot be determined'; EXIT 1} If ($DomainNetBIOS -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainNetBIOS cannot be determined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountName -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountName not defined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountPwd -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountPwd cannot be determined'; EXIT 1}
Log "**** Starting: Site System Install... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Customise PS1 template for Site System install..." # Copy Template file Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\System Center\Server Provisioning\Secondary-DP" $PS1File = "$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\Unattend_$CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME.ps1" Move-Item "$ScriptPath\Unattend_Template_SITESYS.ps_" $PS1File -Force
# Update template $CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME = $CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME.ToUpper() (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "ServerFQDN =.*" , "ServerFQDN = `"$CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME.$DomainFQDN`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File
Log "Install ConfigMgr 2012 Site System..." $ArgList = "-file $PS1File" $ret = LaunchProcessAsUser "$PShEXE" $ArgList $ServiceAccountName $ServiceAccountPwd If ($ret -ne 0) {Log "ERROR: Exitcode = $ret. Failed to install ConfigMgr 2012 Site System. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Creating User Profile Cleanup Task..." $SchTasks_Date = (Get-Date).AddDays(5).ToString("MM/dd/yyyy") $ProfPath = $env:UserProfile # Create Agility User cleanup script echo "Get-CimInstance win32_userprofile -Verbose | Where {`$_.LocalPath -eq '$ProfPath'} | Remove-CimInstance -Verbose" > $env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1 SchTasks /Create /SC "Once" /SD $SchTasks_Date /ST 01:00 /F /RU "SYSTEM" /TN "Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME" /TR "Powershell.exe -File '$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1'" Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Site System Install... ****"

ns1:variable.ns1:name: CM_SITESYSTEM_NETBIOSNAME
ns1:variable.ns1:description: NetBIOS name of Site System Server
